data.title: Lily's Italian Bistro
data.text: My daughter and I had lunch there we both were in agreement that it was overpriced, the service was slow and the food wasn't that good. We were very disappointed because we had heard so many good things about it. Don't know if we just went on a bad day or what but we won't be back.

Ultra high-end Italian fare. 
Flawless service, best in this town. 
I've got to recommend the "grilled Caesar salad " and the mussels. 
Will definitely return.

data.title: Great up-scale Lunch in Gastonia
data.text: Been to this restaurant several times and at least 3-times for lunch.  Great selection at lunch time with really good salads (with protein if you like) as well as pasta's and fish.  They've always had a lunch special when I've been there.  Service is really good and sitting outside when warm/cool enough is a good option.

data.title: Excellent lunch at Lily's
data.text:
We had a super lunch at Lilly's on a Saturday. Wonderful local place with attentive, friendly service. The food was a great surprise - all fantastic. Fresh and delicious.
Thoroughly recommend Lily's.

data.title: Delicious Food
data.text: We enjoyed this small, family run place. The food was delicious. We had pasta with seafood and both of us loved it. Our servers gave us personal attention.  The atmosphere was nice. This is a place for couples and those looking for romance.

data.title: Great Lunch
data.text: Lily's is a nice spot on a redeveloping street in Gastonia. Atmosphere is pleasant and service was good. We had the Italian burger with salad and the Frutti di Mare. Both were excellent. The only negative is the time to receive entrees was rather long. If you are not in a hurry, it's well worth the wait.

data.title: Best Italian Food in Gaston County
data.text: I can't afford this place for dinner, but lunch is a different story....  I go there quite often.  If I get to pick, that's where we go.  My favorite is the salmon cake wrap with a side salad with champagne vinaigrette.  They also have a fabulous wedge salad with steak.  The finest food for lunch around.

data.title: very very good, small quaint Italian Restaurant.
data.text: My adult kids and I had lunch here.  It was very good.  Our only one complaint was that the portions could have been bigger.  The tiramisu was the best we have ever had!

data.title: Denese
data.text: It was fabulous the service great the food outstanding I had the scallops the wine was great Can't wait to go back it is a wonderful restaurant !!

data.title: Little Italy!!
data.text: My friend and I have been to lunch there twice now and it has been great both times! We love the prosciutto and cheese balls (forgot their real name) as an appetizer! Also you must try the chocolate bag (yes, it really is a bag made of chocolate!) for dessert!

data.title: Fantastic
data.text: I really don't know where to begin. This has to be one of the best Italian meals I've ever eaten. I do not like one I drink their sangria it's probably the best thing I've ever ever drink is fantastic. The food was just superb The Waiting staff superb I would recommend this for anybody. Thank you to all the people that contributed to gave me the opportunity to come here I appreciate it.

data.title: Very Good!
data.text: Was downtown and was told by someone that we should check them out. So we stopped by for lunch. No wait, great waitress and amazing food. I will deff be back!!

data.title: Awesomely yummy
data.text: Great food and friendly staff.  Wonderful menu of authentic Italian and Italian inspired dishes.   Highly recommended!  Cute outdoor patio area with heaters in the colder months.

data.title: Lunch with friends
data.text: Meeting out of town friends coming through Gastonia and decided to go to Lily's for lunch. Turned out to be a very good choice. Very nice place with great food choices. The service was excellent. We all had different kinds of salads with chicken, shrimp or salmon added and each was excellent for a reasonable price. Definately recommend Lily's Italian Bistro.

data.title: Lunch with 3year old & her father
data.text: Downtown Gastonia on other business and on the spur of the moment decided on Lily's. What delight!!!  All three of us enjoyed our selections, prompt and gracious service and reasonable prices. We have eaten here before and enjoyed our experience each time. Eating outside is an option when the weather is not so desperately hot!

data.title: Lunch time elegance and ease
data.text: I have now eaten at Lily's several times, each time the food is as described, well prepared and tasted good. The service is good, even when busy the servers engage and check - but Not excessively. The last visit we expected more to join our party, but only 1/2 showed up, we were not made to feel like we were too few for our table nor were we moved along even though our Lunch was Very Leisurely, our choice, not slow service. They handle Duck well, not something I can say of many other restaurants in the area.

data.title: Go for the food, enjoy the service and atmosphere, too.
data.text: Knocking Italian food out of the ball park!  Grilled whole Italian artichoke was a delicious surprise as well as homemade ravioli.  The wine list is well thought out and matches the food offerings especially well.

data.title: Eat before you go!
data.text: I went with family on a Friday afternoon. It wasn't to busy which was great. We had excellent service and the decor was casual and very well done.  The penne with chicken was missing the chicken,olives and artichokes and the bistro salad was missing the fresh mozzarella artichoke hearts. The other entree of broccoli rabe came as it should. Seems like they ran out of some ingredients. I did not complain since I had guests. I would recommend to future dinners to check that all ingredients are included in  your order.

data.title: A surprise in every way
data.text:
I ended up here after picking up family from the Charlotte airport and wanting a good meal on our way back to South Carolina. There is precious little near the airport. This was a fantastic choice and we all very much enjoyed our meals. Eating outside on the patio with our bottle of wine and classic Italian music playing in the background was very enjoyable.  The food was freshly prepared. I ordered a vegetarian dish off the menu which was a pile of assorted veggies surrounding a just-right portion of capellini with a lemon-caper sauce and was actually the envy of my meat-eating guests.
Parking was a breeze in downtown Gastonia. Service was great.

data.title: Delicioso!
data.text:
Casual elegance is what I would call the ambiance.  You can sit inside or outside.  I had the shrimp pizza with pesto, pancetta, and andouille sausage.  My wife had the southwestern ravioli.  Both dishes were delicious.  

We had excellent service, great ambiance, and delicious food at reasonable prices.  We will be back!!!
